title: Poster, 2010-21-90, 1979–1980
provenance: Acquired from dealers, galleries and auction houses by Marc Benda.  Remained with Benda until 2010, when gifted to CHNDM.
creditline: Gift of Sara and Marc Benda
description: A high-contrast photograph of a man with half-closed eyes and drooping mouth, digitally "colored" with black pixillated "patches" and tinted magenta and blue, with traces of cyan and yellow. On the white field below the man's chin, in lower left, the inscription: "FILM POSLKI / PRESENTE LE FILM DE / ANDRZEJ WAJDA / Les Demoiselles de Wilko / PANNY Z WILKA", and in the lower right: "film polski / 6/8 mazowlecka / 00-048 warsaw / poland".
